LOCATION: Ginger Island (Alice in Wonderland – Dive Site)
CORAL_SPECIES: Montastrea annularis, Porites, Millepora, Agaricia, Diploria sp., Acropora
MORTALITY:
Percentage of dead coral : 10%
Type of dead coral : Diploria labyrinthiformis, Agaricia, Diploria stigosa, Montastrea Annularis, Acropora cervicornis
REMARKS:
Reef zones that were affected: Fore reef ef (spur & groove)
Percentage of live coral cover in the area : 60%
Percentage of live coral that is bleached : 90%
Bleaching start in Mid- Late Sept.
Other observations : High percentage of Cyanophytes in numerous “patches”
SOURCE:
Shannon Gore, ( sd_gore@yahoo.com), Conservation & Fisheries Department, Government of the BVI, British Virgin Islands
Personal comunication to ReefBase
